history.content: Create a fantasy warrior with silver armor
I'll create a fantasy warrior with silver armor for you. Let me generate this as a new character asset with detailed specifications for the silver armor and warrior appearance.
Give them a flaming sword and a flowing red cape

I'll add the flaming sword and flowing red cape to your fantasy warrior. Since you want to make two changes, I'll do them one at a time for the best results - first the flaming sword, then the flowing red cape.
Now add the flowing red cape
Awaiting approval: Add variant to existing asset

params.name: Silver Armored Warrior
params.prompt: Fantasy warrior in gleaming silver plate armor, intricate engravings on breastplate and pauldrons, polished steel finish with mirror-like reflections, leather straps and buckles, chainmail visible at joints, imposing helmet with T-shaped visor, sturdy leather boots, battle-ready stance with hand on sword hilt, dramatic lighting with rim light highlighting armor edges, fantasy illustration style, medieval fantasy aesthetic

params.prompt: Add flaming sword. Warrior now holding a sword with blade wreathed in orange and red flames, fire dancing along the edges

geminiRequest.prompt: Add flaming sword. Warrior now holding a sword with blade wreathed in orange and red flames, fire dancing along the edges

params.prompt: Add flowing red cape. Cape drapes dramatically behind the warrior, billowing in the wind.
